SEARCH
Package gw.api.databuilder

Class RandomBigDecimalGenerator

java.lang.Object
gw.api.databuilder.RandomBigDecimalGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValueGenerator<BigDecimal>
public class RandomBigDecimalGenerator extends Object implements ValueGenerator<BigDecimal>
Generates random decimals of the given precision and scale. This class is thread-safe, as it is intended that the same instance be used on multiple builder instances.
